name: AlertDialog
description: Modal alert dialog with customizable header, content, and actions.

use: you need a focused confirmation or alert surface.
you want a styled modal without wiring overlays manually.
avoid: you need a full-screen dialog or custom route transitions.

examples.minimal:
AlertDialog(
  title: const Text('Delete file?'),
  content: const Text('This action cannot be undone.'),
  actions: [
    TextButton(
      onPressed: () => Navigator.of(context).pop(),
      child: const Text('Cancel'),
    ),
    TextButton(
      onPressed: _delete,
      child: const Text('Delete'),
    ),
  ],
)

theming: Uses `Theme.of(context)` surface tokens (radius, surface blur/opacity, colors).
accessibility: Provide clear titles and actionable button labels.
do: Keep dialog content concise and scannable.
